data.question: 1) Which of the following is the correct name of React.js?
2) Which of the following command is used to install create-react-app?
3) What of the following is used in React.js to increase performance?
4) A class is a type of function, but instead of using the keyword function to initiate it, which keyword do we use?
5) Which of the following keyword is used to create a class inheritance?
6) Which of the following acts as the input of a class-based component?
7) What is the default port where webpack-server runs?
8) How many numbers of elements a valid react component can return?
9) What is the declarative way to render a dynamic list of components based on values in an array?
10) What are the two ways to handle data in React?
